title: Miles for Smiles (Encore)
description:
Billy Flanigan is an entertainer at heart. He’s worked at Walt Disney World for nearly 40 years — but when the park closed down in March, he found a new way to create smiles.

Follow Billy on Instagram

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Give a gift that sparks curiosity with Kiwi Co. Get 50% off your first month, plus free shipping with promo code SMILE at kiwico.com.

Find your new favorite bra with Third Love. For 10% of your first purchase, go to ThirdLove.com/SMILE.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
